body:
Updates

Recruitment - Search
  • The search page for Recruitment has been updated to match the search form found throughout the rest of Network360.
Internet Explorer Support
  • User are no longer able to access Network360 using Internet Explorer browser version 8, 9, or 10.
    • If a user attempts to access the system with IE8, 9, or 10, they will receive a message that their browser is not supported with a link to help them upgrade their browser.
